text: Brookline is a city in Massachusetts. It is west of Boston, Massachusetts. The 2020 United States Census reported that Brookline's population is 63,191. The city was settled in 1638. Brookline was incorporated in 1705. ==Notable people== * Michael Bloomberg, former Mayor of New York City *Members of the Kennedy Family **John F. Kennedy, former President of the United States **Ted Kennedy, former United States Senator **Eunice Kennedy Shriver **Kathleen Agnes Kennedy Cavendish **Rosemary Kennedy **Joseph P. Kennedy, Jr. **Patricia Kennedy **Robert F. Kennedy, former United States Senator and United States Attorney General **Jean Kennedy Smith *Michael Dukakis, the 1988 Presidential election Democratic candidate and former Governor of Massachusetts *Mike Wallace, former journalist *Barbara Walter's Conan O'Brian ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Cities in Massachusetts Category:1638 establishments in Massachusetts
title: Brookline, Massachusetts
